CONFIRM_CONNECT_NODE_ITSELF: Do you really want to connect the node to itself?
SELECT_NODE_FIRST: You have to select a node(s) first!
GRAPH_NO_EULERIAN_PATH: This graph does not have an eulerian path!
FOR_UNDIRECTED_GRAPH_ONLY:
This algorithm works on undirected graphs only!
Switch to undirected edges by pressing 'd'.
FOR_DIRECTED_GRAPH_ONLY: The algorithm works on directed graphs only!
INVALID_FLOW_NETWORK: This graph is not a valid flow network!
CAN_NOT_EDIT_MULTIPLE_NODES: You can not edit multiple nodes at the same time!
RESULT_VIEW_POPUP_MOUSEOVER:
You are in the result view!
You can return to the normal view by pressing 'r' or in the menu 'Graph' -> 'Reset'
CAN_NOT_ADD_NODE_LABEL_AREADY_EXISTS:
Can not create node!
There already exists a node with this label. Please choose a different label.
TITLE: GraphPlayground
